      • insertFile

        public static void insertFile(VStoreFile f)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Inserts the given file into the local sqlite database.
        Parameters:
        f - The file.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case something went wrong during the query.

      • getFile

        public static VStoreFile getFile(java.lang.String uuid)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Reads a file from the local sqlite database.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the file to read from the database.
        Returns:
        The file, if available. Null, if no file was found for the given UUID.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case something went wrong during the query.

      • getFiles

        public static java.util.List<VStoreFile> getFiles(java.lang.String ordering)
                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a list of the files currently in the local database. Will not return files marked for deletion.
        Parameters:
        ordering - The ordering of the list.
        Returns:
        A list containing the files.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case something went wrong during the query.

      • updateFile

        public static void updateFile(VStoreFile f,
                              boolean uploadPending,
                              boolean uploadFailed,
                              boolean deletePending)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates flags of a file in the database.
        Parameters:
        f - The file to update
        uploadPending - Set this to false, if an upload is not pending anymore.
        uploadFailed - Set this to true, if an upload failed because of a server error.
        deletePending - Set this to true, if the file should be marked for deletion.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case something went wrong during the query.

      • updateFile

        public static void updateFile(java.lang.String fileUUID,
                              boolean uploadPending,
                              boolean uploadFailed,
                              boolean deletePending)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates the upload pending flag of a file with the given id in the database.
        Parameters:
        fileUUID - The file id for which to update the fields.
        uploadPending - Set this to false, if the update is not pending anymore.
        uploadFailed - Set this to true, if the upload failed because of a server error.
        deletePending - Set this to true, if the file should be marked for deletion.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case something went wrong during the query.

      • getFilesToUpload

        public static java.util.List<VStoreFile> getFilesToUpload(java.lang.String ordering)
                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a list of files that are still in the 'upload pending' state.
        Parameters:
        ordering - The ordering of the list.
        Returns:
        A list containing the files.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case something went wrong during the query.

      • getNumberOfFilesToUpload

        public static int getNumberOfFilesToUpload()
                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns:
        The number of files that are still to be uploaded by the framework.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case something went wrong during the query.

      • getPrivateFilesOnly

        public static java.util.List<VStoreFile> getPrivateFilesOnly(java.lang.String ordering)
        Reads only files from the local sqlite database that are flagged as private.
        Parameters:
        ordering - The ordering of the list.
        Returns:
        A list of private files.

      • getFilesForDeletion

        public static java.util.List<VStoreFile> getFilesForDeletion()
        Reads only those files from the database that have the DELETE_PENDING flag set.
        Returns:
        A list of files that are still pending to be deleted.

      • deleteFile

        public static void deleteFile(java.lang.String uuid)
        Deletes the file with the given UUID from the database
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the file to delete.

      • markForDeletion

        public static void markForDeletion(java.lang.String uuid)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Sets the DELETE_PENDING flag in the database. The background service will then try to delete all files marked as DELETE_PENDING in the background.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the file to delete.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case something went wrong during the query.

      • isMyFile

        public static boolean isMyFile(java.lang.String uuid)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks if the file with the given UUID was published by this phone.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID to check
        Returns:
        True, if this phone uploaded the file.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case something went wrong during the query.

      • isAlreadyStored

        public static boolean isAlreadyStored(java.lang.String md5_hash)
        Checks the given md5 hash against the database.
        Parameters:
        md5_hash - The md5 hash to search for in the database.
        Returns:
        True, if a file with the hash is already in the database.

      • q

        private static java.lang.String q(boolean q)
        Workaround for simplifying the sql field list
        Parameters:
        q - True, if a questionmark should be included in the list (for prepared statements)
        Returns:
        True: " = ?, " False: ", "

      • getFieldList

        private static java.lang.String getFieldList(boolean q)
